text:
*Just 1 week left of our e-mentoring programme* @everyone
:grin::flushed::scream:
We wrap up our pilot e-mentoring programme this at *midnight on Sunday*, so be sure to make the most of your E-Mentors until then!

*This is a great chance to enjoy relaxed, unbiased and frank conversation with real employers before you make big decisions about A-Levels*. Ask all of those _juicy_ questions about work life that you've wanted to know as well as soak up the tips and secrets that your mentors have learned throughout their years of experience!

:point_right:*Your challenge for this week:* Complete our feedback form and get insights on how your thoughts might have changed since having an E-Mentor. We'll also be using your feedback to directly influence how we build our product so tell us the truth. We promise you won't hurt our feelings :smiley: [Link here>>> <https://prospela.typeform.com/to/uKzfQl>]

In the meantime, before Sunday make the most of your E-Mentors whilst they are still ready and waiting to help you through the Prospela platform!
:muscle::muscle::muscle:
